name: Chocolate Chip Pudding Cookies
ingredients: 1 cups butter or 1/2 cups oil and melted butter
1 pkg. (4 serving size) instant vanilla pudding
instructions: Combine butter, sugars, pudding mix and vanilla in large bowl; beat until creamy.
Gradually add flour and baking soda, then stir in chips and nuts.
Batter will be sort of stiff.
